name: Egyptian Ratslap - Card Game
description: As you enter the game, you will be welcomed with the smooth jazz music and the main menu screen. From there you can configure settings, look at a detailed instructions on the rules of the card game, or go right ahead and play the game! The aim of the game is to make the player use short term memorization skills to beat 3 bots who are all trying to have the most cards to win the game. And don't forget that anyone in the game can slap back in once they have lost all of their cards so make sure you keep track of what cards have been placed or you might be in trouble. Once a player has reached 52 cards, they have won Egyptian Ratslap!
